code: @Override public Properties resolveProperties(CamelContext context, boolean ignoreMissingLocation, List<PropertiesLocation> locations) throws Exception {     Properties answer = new Properties().     boolean explicit = false.     for (PropertiesLocation location : locations) {         if ("blueprint".equals(location.getResolver())) {             blueprint.addPropertyPlaceholder(location.getPath()).             // indicate an explicit blueprint id was configured             explicit = true.         } else {             // delegate the url             answer.putAll(delegate.resolveProperties(context, ignoreMissingLocation, Collections.singletonList(location))).         }     }     if (!explicit) {         // this is convention over configuration         for (String id : blueprint.lookupPropertyPlaceholderIds()) {             blueprint.addPropertyPlaceholder(id).         }     }     return answer. }
